alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 2:13PM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. Strong winds with the front may also cause blowing and drifting of snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will bring a band of moderate to heavy snow between 3 am and 8 am depending on location, lasting 1-2 hours in most locations. This will bring significant impacts for travel including the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
